name: Subscribe new people from Google Sheets to Zoho Campaigns mailing list
description: Make wil watch for new rows in a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet at regular intervals and subscribe people to a mailing list in Zoho Campaigns. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/15458uNcPAeQ4t6aWpzDUmO696CImUk-V__NqQc-40fg/edit?usp=sharing).
